bio: Senior special education expert with 15+ years of experience in inclusive education and disability support.
Certified Braille instructor and accessibility specialist. Expert in tactile learning methods for visually impaired students.
Assistive technology specialist with expertise in screen readers, voice control, and adaptive devices for daily living.
Occupational therapist specializing in sensory integration and self-regulation for individuals with autism and ADHD.
Speech-language pathologist with expertise in AAC devices and communication disorders.
